name: Terracotta (itch)
description:
You play as Roy who suffers depression and unable to find a job, his loving wife surprise him with a video game to play. 

Suddenly  he is transported into a world of mystery and strange characters, will this help him going through a tough time or make it worse?

Information:

This game is a unique FMV game, took 3 weeks to complete, sorry for the horrible acting but the concept is there.

Ask questions, navigate and find hidden interactive objects in this short FMV game.

There was more planned but there wasn't enough time to complete, due to production scheduling.

Enjoy the game cheers.

Adam Klappers
